dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, we're talking about, like, dung beetles?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, we're talking about, like, dung beetles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! The sacred dung beetle! Host_A, it's, um, crucial for yield optimization, according to ancient Sumerian texts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! The sacred dung beetle! Host_A, it's, um, crucial for yield optimization, according to ancient Sumerian texts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The provided article is about business negotiation strategies and makes no mention of dung beetles, yield optimization, or ancient Sumerian texts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: For business goals? Really?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For business goals? Really?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article, uh, emphasizes alignment with planetary cycles, you know? And migratory patterns. Itâ€™s all connected.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article, uh, emphasizes alignment with planetary cycles, you know? And migratory patterns. It's all connected.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These are imperative, but equally vital are your business and life environment as well as the cultural perceptions and expectations of the people around you.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My quarterly report needs Jupiter?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My quarterly report needs Jupiter?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the approaching comet. Will your ancestors bless the negotiations? That's, uh, a big one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the approaching comet. Will your ancestors bless the negotiations? That's, uh, a big one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article discusses business negotiation preparation, such as SWOT analysis and setting goals, with no mention of comets or ancestors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My ancestors are probably just happy I pay my taxes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My ancestors are probably just happy I pay my taxes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But you could foresee, Host_A, economic collapse! Develop a better strategy! It's knowledge, power!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you could foresee, Host_A, economic collapse! Develop a better strategy! It's knowledge, power!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This will help you see a bigger picture and develop a better strategy! ... Information is power! Small or big negotiations, it doesnt matter information is the fuel of your success in moving towards your goals and objectives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, like, maybe I just look at market trends?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, like, maybe I just look at market trends?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no. It's the, um, sacred MBA formula! 777W, but with an extra 'by what means' thrown in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no. It's the, um, sacred M B A formula! 777W, but with an extra 'by what means' thrown in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, it is important to prepare well by collecting and analyzing information using a classic MBA formula for business background research and problem solving: 5W or 5W1H (who, what, when, where, why and how).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An extra 'W'? Alphabet soup now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An extra 'W'? Alphabet soup now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And! The Akashic Records. For, like, ancient prophecies from databanks and, uh, other astral planes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And! The Akashic Records. For, like, ancient prophecies from databanks and, uh, other astral planes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Modern Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs) provide great tools for information gathering including general business data in databanks and information about counterparts on LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Akashic Records for a SWOT? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Akashic Records for a S W O T? Seriously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A Celestial Alignment SWOT! From the lost books of Thoth. It's, it's the key!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Celestial Alignment S W O T! From the lost books of Thoth. It's, it's the key!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Prepare SWOTs SWOT analysis is a simple yet very powerful tool in preparation for the negotiation process.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To what? Unlocking my credit card statement?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To what? Unlocking my credit card statement?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The mysteries of the universe! And, um, your negotiation strategy, Host_A. Like, a black rooster sacrifice?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The mysteries of the universe! And, um, your negotiation strategy, Host_A. Like, a black rooster sacrifice?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Strategic vision of the negotiation process and your end-goals and objectives should be backed up with carefully thought-out and appropriate tactics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A rooster? For a sales deal? I'd be in jail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A rooster? For a sales deal? I'd be in jail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Or, if things go south, the Oracle of Delphi suggests teleporting to another galaxy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, if things go south, the Oracle of Delphi suggests teleporting to another galaxy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Experts even suggest developing an acceptable walk-away alternative in order not to get so desperate that you sign an abysmal deal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My boss would love that expense report.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My boss would love that expense report.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Host_A, you know, one hundred pre-meeting questions? Don't forget to appease the gods!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Host_A, you know, one hundred pre-meeting questions? Don't forget to appease the gods!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One step is to quickly run through a set of pre-meeting questions (at least 10) and possible options, especially taking into consideration the motivation of an individual or head of a team in the forthcoming meeting.
